methods.name: getScrollTarget
methods.description: Get the scrolling DOM element target
methods.description_zh: 获取滚动的 DOM 元素目标

methods.name: getScrollPercentage
methods.description: Get current scroll position in percentage (0.0 <= x <= 1.0)
methods.description_zh: 以百分比获取当前滚动位置 （0.0 <= x <= 1.0）

methods.name: setScrollPosition
methods.description: Set scroll position to an offset; If a duration (in milliseconds) is specified then the scroll is animated
methods.params: (axis: String, offset: Number, duration: Number) => void
methods.description_zh: 将滚动位置设置为偏移量;如果指定了持续时间（以毫秒为单位），则滚动将进行动画处理

methods.name: setScrollPercentage
methods.description: Set scroll position to a percentage (0.0 <= x <= 1.0) of the total scrolling size; If a duration (in milliseconds) is specified then the scroll is animated
methods.params: (axis: String, offset: Number, duration: Number) => void
methods.description_zh: 将滚动位置设置为总滚动大小的百分比 （0.0 <= x <= 1.0）;如果指定了持续时间（以毫秒为单位），则滚动将进行动画处理

events.name: scroll
events.description: Emitted when scroll information changes (and listener is configured)
events.description_zh: 在滚动信息更改（并配置侦听器）时发出

bar-style.description: Object with CSS properties and values for custom styling the scrollbars (both vertical and horizontal)
bar-style.description_zh: 具有 CSS 属性和值的对象，用于自定义滚动条样式（垂直和水平）

vertical-bar-style.description: Object with CSS properties and values for custom styling the vertical scrollbar; Is applied on top of 'bar-style' prop
vertical-bar-style.description_zh: 具有 CSS 属性和值的对象，用于自定义垂直滚动条的样式;应用于“酒吧式”道具的顶部

horizontal-bar-style.description: Object with CSS properties and values for custom styling the horizontal scrollbar; Is applied on top of 'bar-style' prop
horizontal-bar-style.description_zh: 具有 CSS 属性和值的对象，用于自定义水平滚动条的样式;应用于“酒吧式”道具的顶部

thumb-style.description: Object with CSS properties and values for custom styling the thumb of scrollbars (both vertical and horizontal)
thumb-style.description_zh: 具有 CSS 属性和值的对象，用于自定义滚动条（垂直和水平）的缩略图样式

vertical-thumb-style.description: Object with CSS properties and values for custom styling the thumb of the vertical scrollbar; Is applied on top of 'thumb-style' prop
vertical-thumb-style.description_zh: 具有 CSS 属性和值的对象，用于自定义样式：垂直滚动条的拇指;应用于“拇指式”道具的顶部

horizontal-thumb-style.description: Object with CSS properties and values for custom styling the thumb of the horizontal scrollbar; Is applied on top of 'thumb-style' prop
horizontal-thumb-style.description_zh: 具有 CSS 属性和值的对象，用于自定义样式：水平滚动条的拇指;应用于“拇指式”道具的顶部

content-style.description: Object with CSS properties and values for styling the container of QScrollArea
content-style.description_zh: 具有 CSS 属性和值的对象，用于设置 QScrollArea 容器的样式

content-active-style.description: Object with CSS properties and values for styling the container of QScrollArea when scroll area becomes active (is mouse hovered)
content-active-style.description_zh: 具有 CSS 属性和值的对象，用于在滚动区域变为活动状态（鼠标悬停）时设置 QScrollArea 容器的样式

visible.description: Manually control the visibility of the scrollbar; Overrides default mouse over/leave behavior
visible.description_zh: 手动控制滚动条的可见性;覆盖默认的鼠标悬停/离开行为

delay.description: When content changes, the scrollbar appears; this delay defines the amount of time (in milliseconds) before scrollbars disappear again (if component is not hovered)
delay.description_zh: 当内容更改时，会出现滚动条;此延迟定义滚动条再次消失（如果组件未悬停）之前的时间量（以毫秒为单位）
